attributes.action: Assist in the defeat of Boko Haram
attributes.additional_details:
"Boko Haram Islamists in Nigeria accused of killing sleeping children. About 40 students aged between 11 and 18 shot, stabbed and burned alive."
The UK government must petition the UN, to aid the failing Nigerian militery to stop the unlawful massacre of people by Boko Haram.
Capture and prosecute those responsible on the UN Crimes Against Humanity and Genocide.
